original_title: Guairaka'i Ja - o Dono da Lontra
overview: Guarani-Mbya people believe that every being in this world, even animals that are hunted, have a spirit/owner watching over them. Some of this 'owners' can get really vindictive if they feel disrespected in any way...
title: Guairaka'i Ja - o Dono da Lontra
